content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (  SELECT *  FROM sys.tables t JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
                    WHERE t.name = 'FactTable' AND s.name = 'gold')
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.FactTable
        WITH
        (
            LOCATION = 'FactTable',
            DATA_SOURCE = gold_source,
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_format
        )
        SELECT
            O.DimOrders,
            C.DimCust,
            P.DimProd,
            R.DimGeog,
            F.Quantity,
            F.UnitPrice,
            F.TotalAmount
        FROM
            silver.silverTable F
        LEFT JOIN
            gold.DimCustomers C ON C.CustomerID = F.CustomerID
        LEFT JOIN
            gold.DimRegion R ON R.RegionID = F.RegionID AND R.Country = F.Country
        LEFT JOIN
            gold.DimProducts P ON P.ProductID = F.ProductID
        LEFT JOIN 
            gold.DimOrders O ON O.OrderID = F.OrderID
